metadata.name: Atmos | Exordium Chapter 01
metadata.description:
Atmos: Exordium Chapter 01

Descending from the skies in their Exo suits, members of a notorious criminal organization mount a daring raid on a covert research facility. But as the criminals delve deeper into the top secret station, they will come face-to-face with the monsters contained within.

NFT comic is readable in the Atmos portal at https://portal.atmos.xyz

Learn all about Exordium at https://atmos.xyz/exordium
